Assassin's Vigour.Description: Grants Health after breaking a Behemoth part

Tier 1.Description: Heal 50 when you break a part

Tier 2.Description: Heal 100 when you break a part

Tier 3.Description: Heal 150 when you break a part

Tier 4.Description: Heal 200 when you break a part

Tier 5.Description: Heal 250 when you break a part

Tier 6.Description: Heal 300 when you break a part

Bloodless.Description: Protects against Wounded and Crippling Wounds statuses.

Tier 1.Description: Reduces duration of Wounded status by 50%

Tier 2.Description: Reduces duration of Wounded status by 80%

Tier 4.Description:
Reduces effectiveness of Crippling Wounded status by 50%
Immune to Wounded status

Tier 5.Description:
Reduces effectiveness of Crippling Wounded status by 80%
Immune to Wounded status

Tier 6.Description: Immune to Wounded statusImmune to Crippling Wound status

Fireproof.Description: Protects against being set on fire.

Tier 1.Description: Reduces duration of On Fire status by 10%

Tier 2.Description: Reduces duration of On Fire status by 20%

Tier 3.Description: Reduces duration of On Fire status by 40%

Tier 4.Description: Reduces duration of On Fire status by 60%

Tier 5.Description: Reduces duration of On Fire status by 80%

Tier 6.Description: Immune to being set on fire.

Fortress.Description: Grants a small shield after avoiding damage for a short time.

Tier 1.Description: Grants a 10 health shield after not getting hit for 10s

Tier 2.Description: Grants a 20 health shield after not getting hit for 10s

Tier 3.Description: Grants a 40 health shield after not getting hit for 10s

Tier 4.Description: Grants a 60 health shield after not getting hit for 10s

Tier 5.Description: Grants a 80 health shield after not getting hit for 10s

Tier 6.Description: Grants a 100 health shield after not getting hit for 10s

Guardian.Description: Grants a portion of any shield applied to you to your nearest ally.

Tier 1.Description: +10% of any shield applied to you is also applied to your nearest ally for 15s

Tier 2.Description: +20% of any shield applied to you is also applied to your nearest ally for 15s

Tier 3.Description: +30% of any shield applied to you is also applied to your nearest ally for 15s

Tier 4.Description: +40% of any shield applied to you is also applied to your nearest ally for 15s

Tier 5.Description: +50% of any shield applied to you is also applied to your nearest ally for 15s

Tier 6.Description: +60% of any shield applied to you is also applied to your nearest ally for 15s

Iceborne.Description: Increases Defense when at low health, and at later ranks, grants life steal

Tier 1.Description: When under 50% health, grants +5% decreased damage taken

Tier 2.Description: When under 50% health, grants +10% decreased damage taken

Tier 3.Description: When under 50% health, grants +15% decreased damage taken

Tier 4.Description:
When under 50% health, grants +20% decreased damage taken
While Iceborne is active, grants 4% lifesteal that cannot heal beyond 50% health

Tier 5.Description:
When under 50% health, grants +20% decreased damage taken
While Iceborne is active, grants 6% lifesteal that cannot heal beyond 50% health

Tier 6.Description:
When under 50% health, grants +20% decreased damage taken
While Iceborne is active, grants 8% lifesteal that cannot heal beyond 50% health

Insulated.Description: Protects against Shocked status effect and allows you to attack electric shields.

Tier 1.Description: Reduces duration of Shocked status by 25%

Tier 2.Description: Reduces duration of Shocked status by 50%

Tier 3.Description: Reduces duration of Shocked status by 75%

Tier 4.Description:
Reduces duration of Shocked status by 75%
Reduces knockback and damage of hitting electrified shields.

Tier 5.Description:
Reduces duration of Shocked status by 75%
Prevents knockback and damage of hitting electrified shields.

Tier 6.Description:
Immune to Shocked status
Prevents knockback and damage of hitting electrified shields.

Nine Lives.Description: Grants a chance to reduce damage, and later the ability to cheat death.

Shellshock Resist.Description: Protects against the explosion damage and status effect Shellshock.

Sturdy.Description: Prevents being staggered on a cooldown.

Warmth.Description: Protects against Chilled and Frozen status effects.

Agility.Description: Reduces the stamina cost of dodging.

Fleet Footed.Description: Temporarily increases Movement Speed after a dodge.

Nimble.Description: Restores Stamina when dodging through behemoth attacks.

Swift.Description: Increases Movement Speed when your weapon is sheathed.

Aetherhunter.Description: Increases damage against aether charged Behemoths.

Deconstruction.Description: Bonus damage against objects created by Behemoths.

Pacifier.Description: Increases Stagger damage against enraged Behemoths.

Rage.Description: Increases your damage when your health is low.

Acidic.Description: Increases Wound damage at the cost of Part damage.

Adrenaline.Description: Increases damage dealt based on stamina spent.

Barbed.Description: Adds a flat amount of Wound damage on hit.

Bladestorm.Description: Adds a flat amount of Part damage on hit.

Cunning.Description: Grants a chance to deal double damage.

Evasive Fury.Description: Temporarily increases attack speed when dodging through a Behemoth's attack.

Merciless.Description: Increases Wound damage against staggered Behemoths.

Molten.Description: Grants Molten Heart drops on cooldown.

Predator.Description: Increases damage after avoiding damage for a short time.

Weighted Strikes.Description: Adds a flat amount of Stagger damage on hit. At later ranks, allows more weapon attacks to interrupt.

Wild Frenzy.Description: Increases Attack Speed when at low health.

Aetherborne.Description: Increases the benefits of using aether vents.

Aetheric Attunement.Description: Percent increase to Lantern Charge gained from attacks.

Aetheric Frenzy.Description: Gains a flat amount of Lantern Charge on each weapon hit.

Conduit.Description: Using a Lantern's hold ability increases all Slayers' attack speed temporarily.

Lucent.Description: Flask heals over time and generates lantern charge

Medic.Description: Improves your ability to revive allies.

Stunning Vigour.Description: Restores some health whenever a Behemoth is staggered.

Vampiric.Description: Restores some health whenever a Behemoth part is Wounded.
